title: Instalockers
body: Fuck me, dynamic Queue is a piece of shit, normal players are also a piece of shit, so are those Chinese wankers who don't speak english. Instalockers are cancerous. I would call them Stage 4 leafy. This is so Bull. Is there something that can be done? The worst type of instalockers are those that feed. Since the new skins for Riven is out, you do not know how many games i have lost because they are so bad at her. One hand i'm glad they lost lane cause at least they know they are trash and everyone around them does as well, but the other hand i lost game cause of a shit player that thought he was good

replies.body: Ever Consider playing League of Draven?  {{champion:119}}
